brainly_data.question: What type of figurative language is the following sentence Nick and Nivea never knows the air conditioner roared to life in the late afternoon
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: What type of figurative language is the following sentence Nick and Nivea never knows the air conditioner roared to life in the late afternoon
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: Personification because air conditioners can't roar and by saying it does you are giving an inanimate object a human quality.
